description: Can't wait for the full release. Really appreciate the linux support.
love this game has all of ta with few extras to expand on the game , and such a small download

This is an amazing take on the classic Total Annihilation, the grandfather of many of todays biggest RTS games like supreme commander, planetary annihilation, ashes of singularity, grey goo etc. 

This may be the closest thing we will get to a remake of TA. There's still plenty for the devs to do but they're doing it !
It is about 900 mb and it's been hanging at 2 mb for like 10 mins or so. Not playable atm.
summary: It needs to download additional packages

description: launched on Manjaro Phosh on the pinephone (beta 12 I believe?) but was unable to download the update on launch, will keep installed for now and hope to see a fix. This looks very promising and I look forward to playing it!
exact same errors as before EONOT? or something like that. this looks neat, but so far ive no idea if it is or not. cant update or play offline.
Lots of good unit control in the interface.

This is one of the most hard-core RTS games ever, where the very first combat unit can destroy your entire resource pipeline in the time it takes to build one counter-unit. There are also to many unit types and factories, making things more complex then necessary. Last but not least, multiplayer is a total slaughterfest with lots of cheesy tactics and arbitrary rule changes, that make it impossible to recommend for casual players.

If all of this sounds like great selling points, then go at it, but I would not recommend it for anybody who only plays RTS games casually.
summary: Works, looks good, but is not made for mere mortals

description: Fantastic game. Very high quality graphics and huge armyes and good Ai.
FPS is too low, and game is generally super laggy but the gameplay is super fun and the fps problems could be fixed in an future update!
summary: Great game, 10/10 but need some serious optimization

description: It's a really fun game, but it is quite the task on the hardware. It requires a pretty beefy CPU to run the game and it is not to be played on a potato computer. Maybe if the performance was better on lower end hardware I would rate it higher, but overall fantastic game nevertheless. Thank God I have a pretty powerful computer and can actually run this game well.

Dans l’ensemble l'idée est bonne, le jeu à l'air sympa, il fonctionne trés bien sur 22.04, graphiquement il est loin d'etre vilain. 

Je n'ai cependant pas tout compris, le Français n'est pas inclus dans le choix des langues ( il n'y a pas de choix juste l'anglais en fait ), c'est bien dommage car il demande quand même une certaine complexité sur la compréhension du gameplay. 

Un jour peut-être 

Merci pour ce jeu, bonne continuation !

Игра недоделанная . В "single player" cильное неравенство user vs AI. Юзеру надо скролировать и масштабировать экран, действовать последовательно. AI нет небходимости управлять обзором (экраном), он "видит" весь регион. И управляет юнитами параллельно. Таки поставил 4 балла, цель-то правильная
